title: Cruisn [PAL] [Wii] [MULTI5]
description:
Cruis&#039;n plays very similarly to past titles in the Cruis&#039;n series. Players race down one-way courses consisting of streets based on real-life locations while avoiding various road hazards such as oncoming traffic and construction. Players can gain a temporary boost in speed by using nitrous oxide, otherwise known as "N2O" or simply "Nitrous," a feature that was heavily emphasized in the The Fast and the Furious film. However, the player is limited to the number of times the nitrous boost can be used.

Cruis&#039;n, like its arcade counterpart, allows players to customize and upgrade their cars&#039; numerous features, such as spoilers, decals, neon lights, ground effects, and engines. However, players must purchase these upgrades with money earned from races.
